trans-unit.source: Item to which this structure refers

seg-source.mrk: Item to which this structure refers

target.mrk: Item to which this structure refers

trans-unit.source: Set of bit flags and image list indexes that indicate the item's state. When setting the state of an item.

seg-source.mrk: Set of bit flags and image list indexes that indicate the item's state.
When setting the state of an item.

target.mrk: Set of bit flags and image list indexes that indicate the item's state.
When setting the state of an item.

trans-unit.source: The StateMask member indicates the bits of this member that are valid. When retrieving the state of an item, this member returns the current state for the bits indicated in the StateMask member.

seg-source.mrk: The StateMask member indicates the bits of this member that are valid.
When retrieving the state of an item, this member returns the current state for the bits indicated in the StateMask member.

target.mrk: The StateMask member indicates the bits of this member that are valid.
When retrieving the state of an item, this member returns the current state for the bits indicated in the StateMask member.

trans-unit.source: Bits 0 through 7 of this member contain the item state flags.

seg-source.mrk: Bits 0 through 7 of this member contain the item state flags.

target.mrk: Bits 0 through 7 of this member contain the item state flags.

trans-unit.source: Bits 8 through 11 of this member specify the 1-based overlay image index.

seg-source.mrk: Bits 8 through 11 of this member specify the 1-based overlay image index.

target.mrk: Bits 8 through 11 of this member specify the 1-based overlay image index.

trans-unit.source: Bits of the state member that are valid. If you are retrieving an item's state, set the bits of the stateMask member to indicate the bits to be returned in the state member.

seg-source.mrk: Bits of the state member that are valid.
If you are retrieving an item's state, set the bits of the stateMask member to indicate the bits to be returned in the state member.

target.mrk: Bits of the state member that are valid.
If you are retrieving an item's state, set the bits of the stateMask member to indicate the bits to be returned in the state member.

trans-unit.source: If you are setting an item's state, set the bits of the stateMask member to indicate the bits of the state member that you want to set.

seg-source.mrk: If you are setting an item's state, set the bits of the stateMask member to indicate the bits of the state member that you want to set.

target.mrk: If you are setting an item's state, set the bits of the stateMask member to indicate the bits of the state member that you want to set.

target.mrk: Pointer to a null-terminated string that contains the item text.

trans-unit.source: Flag that indicates whether the item has associated child items. This member can be one of the following values:

seg-source.mrk: Flag that indicates whether the item has associated child items.
This member can be one of the following values:

target.mrk: Flag that indicates whether the item has associated child items.
This member can be one of the following values:

trans-unit.source: 0 - The item has no child items

seg-source.mrk: 0 - The item has no child items

target.mrk: 0 - The item has no child items

trans-unit.source: 1 - The item has one or more child items

seg-source.mrk: 1 - The item has one or more child items

target.mrk: 1 - The item has one or more child items

trans-unit.source: A value to associate with the item

target.mrk: A value to associate with the item

seg-source.mrk: Height of the item

target.mrk: Height of the item

trans-unit.source: One or more (as a bitwise combination) of the following extended states.

seg-source.mrk: One or more (as a bitwise combination) of the following extended states.

target.mrk: One or more (as a bitwise combination) of the following extended states.

trans-unit.source: TVIS_EX_DISABLED Windows Vista or later. Creates a control that is drawn in grey, that the user cannot interact with.

seg-source.mrk: TVIS_EX_DISABLED Windows Vista or later.
Creates a control that is drawn in grey, that the user cannot interact with.

target.mrk: TVIS_EX_DISABLED Windows Vista or later.
Creates a control that is drawn in grey, that the user cannot interact with.

trans-unit.source: TVIS_EX_FLAT Creates a flat item—the item is virtual and is not visible in the tree; instead, its children take its place in the tree hierarchy.

seg-source.mrk: TVIS_EX_FLAT Creates a flat item—the item is virtual and is not visible in the tree; instead, its children take its place in the tree hierarchy.

target.mrk: TVIS_EX_FLAT Creates a flat item—the item is virtual and is not visible in the tree; instead, its children take its place in the tree hierarchy.

trans-unit.source: TVIS_EX_HWND Creates a separate HWND for the item.

seg-source.mrk: TVIS_EX_HWND Creates a separate HWND for the item.

target.mrk: TVIS_EX_HWND Creates a separate HWND for the item.

trans-unit.source: Not used; must be NULL.

seg-source.mrk: Not used; must be NULL.

target.mrk: Not used; must be NULL.

trans-unit.source: Index of the image in the control's image list to display when the item is in the expanded state.

target.mrk: Index of the image in the control's image list to display when the item is in the expanded state.
